name: Who Killed Judith Harper?
description:
When a group of journalism students escape to a lake house for a weekend of fun and relaxation, it quickly becomes the worst vacation of their lives. One of their numbers has been violently murdered. The cops are on their way, but you want to make sure the true killer is apprehended when they arrive. You only have one hour to find out Who Killed Judith Harper.

Race
the clock to find clues and determine who the real killer is. But be careful,
your decisions have consequences that could ruin lives...even your own. With
more than 20 possible endings, Who Killed Judith Harper? is a casual murder
mystery reminiscent of Clue and Maniac Mansion. Finding clues may not be easy,
but putting them together may be even harder. Navigate your way through a retro
style lake house as you look for clues and talk to suspects to catch a killer!
